body:
Aunukia@yahoo.com via email suggested:

What I meant was MagArena puts about a 1 pixel wide white border around all cards. It's not really noticable with old white-border cards, but looks jarring with black-border cards (which the majority are). I think that border should be done away with entirely, if possible.

title: remove 1 pixel white border around cards
